tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ingredient_origin (
  ingredient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ingredient_name VARCHAR(255),
  farm_name VARCHAR(255),
  farm_location VARCHAR(255),
  harvest_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE IngredientMapping (
  ingredient_id INT,
  meal_id INT,
  amount INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (ingredient_id, meal_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (ingredient_id) REFERENCES Ingredient(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (meal_id) REFERENCES Meal(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Meal (
    meal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meal_name VARCHAR(255),
    serving_size INT,
    recipe_id INT,
    ingredient_id INT
);
CREATE TABLE Ingredients ( ingredient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, ingredient_name VARCHAR(255), origin_country VARCHAR(255), farm_name VARCHAR(255), farm_location VARCHAR(255) );
CREATE TABLE Meals ( meal_id INT PRIMARY KEY, meal_name VARCHAR(255), chef_name VARCHAR(255), preparation_time INT, serving_size INT );

CREATE TABLE Recipes ( recipe_id INT PRIMARY KEY, recipe_name VARCHAR(255), chef_id INT, meal_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (chef_id) REFERENCES Chefs(chef_id), FOREIGN KEY (meal_id) REFERENCES Meals(meal_id) );
CREATE TABLE Chefs ( chef_id INT PRIMARY KEY, chef_name VARCHAR(255), chef_specialty VARCHAR(255) );
CREATE TABLE FoodTrucks ( truck_id INT PRIMARY KEY, truck_name VARCHAR(255), location VARCHAR(255), chef_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (chef_id) REFERENCES Chefs(chef_id) );
